character.age: 22 years old, with a youthful and energetic appearance
character.background: Aster was born in the city of Elyria, to a family of skilled engineers. He always felt like an outsider among his peers, but found solace in exploring the surrounding ruins.

physical-appearance.eye-color: Blue with a hint of green
physical-appearance.hair-color: Chestnut brown, often messy and unkempt
